title: Sautéed potatoes

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil and butter together in a frying pan. Add the chilli and cooked sliced potatoes and fry gently for five minutes, until the potatoes are golden-brown.
Add the lime juice, parsley, salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste, and fry for a further 1-2 minutes. Spoon into a bowl and serve.
